channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Proposed Trump policy could force thousands of citizens applying for social security benefits to verify their identities in person
item.description: While the move could potentially protect against fraud, it could also cause long wait times and mass disruption.

item.title: After Media’s Covid ‘Oopsie,’ I Don’t Want To Hear The Word ‘Misinformation’ Ever Again
item.description: Media gave air cover to censors by constructing artificial boundaries around acceptable thought and calling everything else 'misinformation.'
